message.body: I'm gonna be in Your neck of the woods tmw if you wanna meet up for a cocktail with me and my friend Sarah in the evening!
i want this! text with details plz!
We are gonna go to 67 Orange Street for a cocktail later tonight after I do some movie stuffs! Not sure exactly what time but I will let you know ASAP! Hope you can come give me a huggie!
lindsey it now seems crazy to me that i would go to BK for drinks tonight bc erin and i got home at 6am last night :)
Haha! You are an animal! I think it's in Harlem. I'm staying at Columbia campus
But I don't think I'll be out of mivie stuff til 10
this now sounds perfect!! can't wait to see ya :)
i will meet you wheneva/whereva works.
